title: Jim "The Hammer" Shapiro
body: Ran out of nails?  ...or did he just pound the wrong thumb?  There's a joke there somewhere.  "<a href="http://msnbc.msn.com/id/4885812/">The courts said his TV commercials were misleading and he tried to solicit business from a comatose accident victim without permission</a>". (from <a title="Ern" href="http://ern.hopto.org/blog" >Ern</a>)
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-05-03

Jim "The Hammer" Shapiro

Ran out of nails? ...or did he just pound the wrong thumb? There's a joke there somewhere.
